Package org.corfudb.runtime.smr

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBufferedSMREngine<T>
    An interface for SMRengines that buffer the commands that are proposed to them.
    IConsumerOnlySMREngineCommand<T>
    Created by mwei on 6/11/15.
    ICorfuDBObject<U>
    Created by mwei on 5/1/15.
    ISMRCheckpoint<T>
    Created by mwei on 6/5/15.
    ISMREngine<T>
    An interface to an SMR engine Created by mwei on 5/1/15.
    ISMREngine.ISMREngineOptions<T>  
    ISMREngineCommand<T,R>
    Created by mwei on 5/1/15.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedSMREngine<T>
    Created by mwei on 6/1/15.
    CachedSMREngine<T>
    This SMR engine is identical to the OneShot, except after a OneShot's one-time use, this SMR engine can be reused, starting at its previously synced location.
    DeferredTransaction
    A deferred transaction gets resolved at runtime: Deferred transactions are always successful if they are successfully proposed to the log.
    LLTransaction
    New type of transaction to support the legacy SMRE.
    LocalTransaction
    Created by mwei on 6/1/15.
    MultiCommand<T,R>
    Created by mwei on 6/1/15.
    OneShotSMREngine<T>
    This is a special SMR engine that syncs to a given timestamp ONCE and stays locked there.
    OpaqueDeferredTransaction
    Created by mwei on 5/5/15.
    OptimisticTransaction
    Created by mwei on 5/6/15.
    Pair<X,Y>  
    PassThroughSMREngine<T>
    This SMR engine is designed for use for transactions only.
    PassthroughTransaction
    Created by mwei on 6/1/15.
    PhysicalObject<T>
    Created by mwei on 6/5/15.
    ReversibleSMREngineCommand<T,R>
    Created by mwei on 5/6/15.
    SimpleSMREngine<T>
    Created by mwei on 5/1/15.
    SMRCheckpoint<T>
    Created by mwei on 5/6/15.
    SMRCommandWrapper
    This is used by SMREngine to wrap commands before serializing them in the stream, so that it can add its own header information.
    SMRLocalCommandWrapper<T,R>
    Created by mwei on 6/1/15.
    SMRUpcallObject
    Created by mwei on 5/29/15.
    ThriftRPCClient
    Created by crossbach on 5/22/15.
    ThriftRPCServer
    Created by crossbach on 5/22/15.
    TimeTravelSMREngine<T>
    Created by mwei on 5/6/15.
    TransactionalContext
    This class implements the thread-local transactional context used for determining whether or not an object is part of a transaction.
    Triple<X,Y,Z>

    Created by mwei on 6/10/15.
